hackathon-description-text: The second iteration of RevolutionUC, a college hackathon aimed at students at the University of Cincinnati and beyond.
hackathon-eligibility: Eligible contestants are students enrolled at an accreddited college or any high school. Organizers and sponsor representatives are not eligible.
hackathon-rules: See RevolutionUC.com for the rules and regulations of the event.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How technically impressive/polished the hack is.
How much learning did the team accomplish? Did they get outside their comfort zone, learn a new technology, or stick to something they knew?

hackathon-description-header: A 200 person hackathon held at the University of Cincinnati
